abstract: Many couples, even on their first date, decide whether they are compatible for the long-term based on their diets and general philosophy about food and dining.
snippet: In marriage and relationships, even on first dates, someone’s diet has become like their clothes or religion, cluing partners in about their loved ones.
lead_paragraph: In marriage and relationships, even on first dates, someone’s diet has become like their clothes or religion, cluing partners in about their loved ones.

headline.main: Going With Your Gut First, Then Your Heart
headline.print_headline: Going With Your Gut First, Then Your Heart
headline.seo: Compatibility by Way of a Refrigerator’s Contents
